question:
Which of the following tribes of the world practice Nomadism?
  1. Fulani people of Africa
  2. Khirgiz people of Central Asia
  3. Bushmen of Sahara
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Fulani of Nigeria, Khirgiz of central Asia and Bushmen of Sahara are the examples of Pastoral Nomadism. Also note that <u>Fulani is largest pastoral nomadic community of the world. </u>
